original_title: SL Rupee further drops against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated further against the US Dollar (USD) today, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
The Rupee has been depreciating since June 6 and today's buying rate of USD is Rs 313.29 while the selling rate is Rs. 327.16.
According to the CBSL, the 6th of June buying rate of USD was Rs. 300 while the selling rate was Rs. 315.10
